mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.officesimplyname AS "officesimplyname", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.ticketname AS "ticketname", a.coinname AS "coinname", a.remarks AS "remarks", office.name AS "office.name", a.coin_rate as "coinRate"
LEFT JOIN sys_office office ON office.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO office_coin_config( id, officesimplyname, office_id, ticketname, coinname, remarks, coin_rate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{officesimplyname}, #{office.id}, #{ticketname}, #{coinname}, #{remarks}, #{coinRate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE office_coin_config SET officesimplyname = #{officesimplyname}, office_id = #{office.id}, ticketname = #{ticketname}, coinname = #{coinname}, remarks = #{remarks}, coin_rate = #{coinRate} WHERE id = #{id}
